title: Operation Bunyanum Marsoos: COAS says unified response marks defining chapter in Pakistan’s military history - DAWN.COM
content:
Chief of Army Staff General Asim Munir has said that the Pakistan Army’s “resolute and unified response” during Operation Bunyanum Marsoos constitutes a “defining chapter” in the country’s military history.

A statement from the Inter Services Public Relations said the army chief made the comments while visiting the Combined Military Hospital Rawalpindi today to enquire after the well-being of soldiers and civilians wounded during the conflict period of Marka-i-Haq and the aforementioned operation.
